extends abstractService
    An abstract class for Exterior services.

        public abstractExterior(String invoiceID,
                        String propertyAddress,
                        PropertySizeEnum propertySize,
                        Boolean scheduledMonthly,
                        Integer numberOfServices,
                        Integer numberOfFloors,
                        Integer month)
        Constructs a new abstractExterior with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        invoiceID - the invoiceID of the exterior service
        propertyAddress - the property address of the exterior service
        propertySize - the property size of the exterior service, represented as an Enum
        scheduledMonthly - a Boolean value checking if the service is monthly or a 1 time service
        numberOfServices - the number of services the property has had, represented as an Integer

      • calculateExteriorServicingPrice

        protected Double calculateExteriorServicingPrice()
        Depending on attributes assigned to creating a new exterior service, this method will help give accurate prices with the size of the property. There is a base rate for each hour of exterior work to be $80. A SMALL property takes exactly 2 hours, so there property gardening fee is $160.00. If it is a medium house it also takes 2 hours, so the property cleaning fee will be $160.00. If the property is a LARGE property, then it will take roughly 4 hours to complete. For a large property the cost will be $320.00.
        Returns:
        the dollar rate that the property owner will pay based on the size of the property.
